abstract: A team of British financiers is working on a £1 billion bid for football club Manchester United, but the club’s owners are not interested in selling, according to British media reports.
snippet: A team of British financiers is working on a £1 billion bid for football club Manchester United, but the club’s owners are not interested in selling, according to British media reports.
lead_paragraph: A team of British financiers is working on a £1 billion bid for the football club Manchester United, but the club’s owners are not interested in selling, according to British media reports.

headline.main: Investors Said to Eye £1 Billion Bid for Manchester United
